p: Compared to the sham-surgery group, the expression of five proteins was significantly up regulated ( P < 0.05) in spinal cord tissue from the ischemia/reperfusion group and included ATP synthase D chain, mitochondrial mitogen-activated protein kinase 1, voltage-dependent anion channel, phosphoglycerate mutase 1, and hypothetical protein-10. In addition, the expression of tubulin beta chain and carbonic anhydrase was significantly down regulated ( P < 0.05). Only calpastatin (spot No. 758,764; accession number: Gi«Ä126302556; M r : 76965; calculated pI: 5.21) was detected in the sham-surgery group ( Table 2).
